Header.title: DataCom - A tool for data computation
Header.paragraph: Tool to be used if you wish to view your data in any format - charts, statistical view or regression modelling view.

About.paragraph: DataCom - A tool for data computation, as the name depicts it is a website that enable you to view every aspects of your data on a single platform with an easy interface and accurate results. DataCom is one stop solution for your needs like viewing your data in charts format, viewing statistical view of your data like mean, median, mode etc and other than this it also provides you with a legacy to view modelling of your data, which can further be used to see future forecasting of your data.
Why: No sign required if you wish not to

Services.name: Unlimited visualizations
Services.text: Even on our free plan, there’s no limit to the number of charts, maps, and tables you can create.

Services.name: Private by default
Services.text: No matter which plan you choose, all your visualizations and data are private until you hit the “Publish” button.

Services.name: Responsive
Services.text: On desktop devices, tablets, or smartphones — DataCom visualizations are beautiful and readable everywhere.

Services.name: PNG, SVG, PDF export
Services.text: Export every visualization as PNG, SVG, or PDF and continue working in for the same data numerous number of times.

Services.name: Live updating
Services.text: All our visualizations can update themselves periodically. Simply link to an external CSV or Google Sheet.

Services.name: Print-ready graphics
Services.text: Even print-ready PDFs with defined CMYK colors are possible.

Features.title: Charts
Features.text: Use one of 19 interactive and responsive chart types ranging from simple bars and lines to arrow, range, and scatter plots.

Features.title: Statistical view of data
Features.text: You can here view Statistical view of your data like mean, median, mode etc in a single screen.

Features.title: Data Modelling
Features.text: It also provides data modelling feature to your data which can further be used to do future forecasting of your data.

Features.title: Download Data in one click
Features.text: Export every visualization as PNG, SVG, or PDF and continue working in, e.g., Adobe Illustrator.
